about_the_game:
This is the first dlc for "Zombie Sanctuary: Ash". It adds a brand new map and new monsters. I hope you like it.

Map:
A completely new map has been added to this dlc.

Monster:
Several different monsters have been added to this dlc.

content_descriptors.notes: The main character of the game is a sexy girl in a bikini.
